bike.description: Double-butted Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo, singlespeed-specific, integrated headset, MID BB shell, hydra-formed chainstays, 3D forged horizontal dropouts w/ intl std disc mount

Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized P.Series BMX, forged alloy, top load, 52mm, 22.2mm clamp
Specialized P.Series MTB Street, heat-treated butted Cr-Mo, 735mm wide, 11-degree backsweep, 2-degree upsweep, 75mm rise
P.Grip BMX, w/ flange, Pruven, end plugs, 150mm
Tektro Novela, mechanical disc, dual pad angle adjustment, 140mm rotor
Tektro, alloy lever
Singlespeed, Cr-Mo, 12T
KMC Z-510H
P.Crank, 3pc. Cr-Mo, tubular arms, 48-spline,165mm, 170mm, 175mm
P.Spline sprocket, 25T
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearings w/ 19mm, 48-spline Cr-Mo spindle,
Nylon platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
P.Disc 26", alloy double-wall, triple void, 32mm, 36h
P.Series disc, alloy, loose ball, solid axle, 36h
P.Series Dirt Jump disc, alloy, sealed cartridge bearings, solid axle w/ track nut, 36h
Stainless, 14g (2.0mm)
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 26x2.3"
Specialized Compound Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 26x2.2"
Standard Schrader valve
